name: La Vieja Habana - Connecticut Shade - Chateau Corona
additionalNotes:
Handmade from the quality leaf left over from the manufacture of Drew Estate’s premium cigar brands, the La Vieja Habana is an exceptional smoking value. This tripa mezclado cigar consistently delivers a great flavor with an excellent draw and burn. Available in three wrapper varietals: Cuban Corojo, 
Their first brand, imagined in NYC around 1996, was not ACID as most people assume. It was a traditional cigar that they created and sold exclusively through their retail ”kiosko“ in the World Trade Center. La Vieja Habana was the beginning of a love affair with the cigar business and the catalyst for “The Rebirth of Cigars”.
